Title: Relates to letters of credit for siting permits
Summary: Directs the office of renewable energy siting and electric transmission to develop a procedure to process letters of credit for siting permits.
LawCode: Amd ยง138, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the office of renewable energy siting and electric transmission to develop a procedure to process any financial security or letter of credit required by the office
